title: President expresses deep grief over death of Begum Naseem Wali
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 16 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi Sunday expressed his deep grief and sorrow over the death of veteran leader of Awami National Party (ANP) Begum Naseem Wali Khan.
The president, in his condolence message, prayed for the departed soul and for the bereaved family to bear the loss with equanimity.
He also expressed sympathies with the bereaved family over her death, a press release said.
The president said that late Begumâ€™s political contributions would be remembered for long.
